p: The tocol profile of post-fermentation corn oil sampled from July 2018 to September 2019 and the average and standard deviation of all values detected are reported in Table 3. Analyses carried out before and after oil saponification allowed the quantification of free and total tocols released after ester hydrolysis. The coelution of β- and γ-homologues of tocopherols and tocotrienols, common in reversed-phase LC systems, is of no relevance in the case of corn, where β-homologues of tocopherols and tocotrienols are known to be absent or negligible [ 14, 34, 35].
